dialogue: It's been a while {20}.
Indeed it has. Well. You have me now, what would you like to discuss?
Why are you doing this?
Ahh yes, the big question. I don't think I can tell you that just yet...
So there IS something bigger than just destroying our bases..
Of course there is!
We will find out what it is eventually, so why not just tell us now?
Of course you will find out eventually. I'm counting on it! In fact, I think quite a lot of people will found out eventually!
What do you mean by that?
WHAT DO Y-
*the sound of sirens echo throghout the interrogation room and {3} bursts into the room*
Sir, we have to go now!
We will finish this later..
Im counting on it!
*{8} and {3} go back into the control room*
Whats happening?
Another missile has been sent! The target, the interrogation block. However, this time, it is not being targetted at the specific cell {20} is in..
Perhaps {20} didn't want to die after all?
Which meant that he knew we'd save him...
We had no choice..
Forget about him, there is missile is nearly here, lets get the walls ready!
You heard the Agent! Get to it!
